question: Please analyze this URL https://leatherwaves.com/
thought: I need to access the URL to obtain a status code and then extract text and hyperlinks from the website to analyze its content. The website is accessible. Now I need to extract text and hyperlinks to analyze its content. The text extracted does not show any signs of scam characteristics. I will now extract hyperlinks to see if there are any non-existent companies or unusual payment methods. I now know the final answer result: False

answer.reason: //leatherwaves.com/ does not exhibit any characteristics of a scam website. There are no unusually low prices claims of free items claims of obtaining unrealistic amounts of money targeting of psychological weaknesses information on non-existent companies handling of different products inappropriate contact information ambiguous privacy notations unusual payment methods or outdated information. Therefore it is not a scam website.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
